snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton, speaking to the American Bar Association, condemned the recent Supreme Court ruling on the Voting Rights Act.
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton, speaking to the American Bar Assn, condemns Supreme Court ruling on the Voting Rights Act, which has paved way for states to pass laws requiring voters to present government-issued photo identification at polls; argues that ruling will limit voters' participation, particularly among minorities, poor and younger voters who disproportionately cast their ballots for Democrats.
lead_paragraph: Hillary Rodham Clinton, speaking to the American Bar Association, condemned the recent Supreme Court ruling on the Voting Rights Act.

headline.main: Clinton Calls for Action to Protect Voter Rights
headline.print_headline: Clinton Calls For Action To Protect Voter Rights
